name: Kids Pool Billiard Trainer FREE
description:
This game is a good pool physics trainer for kids of all ages. It is very funny to play and easy to learn. There are five different games and the goal is to put all the balls in the holes.

Features:
-Realistic pool billiard simulation
-Hours of funny gameplay
-Ideal for all child's
-5 different games
-5 different tables
-Realistic sounds
-Universal version for iPhone, iPod touch and iPad

This is the free version with a few ads - You can find the ad free version in the store.
